attributes.action: Hold a Referendum on whether or not to introduce a Digital ID system.
attributes.additional_details: The proposal to introduce a Digital ID system is controversial and should have the support of the majority of the citizens in a democratic society. Because of the potential for such a system to be a step towards mass surveillance and digital control the Government needs to ensure that the introduction of a Digital ID system is seen as a benefit to the majority it's citizens.
attributes.background: Hold a Referendum on whether or not to introduce a Digital ID system. The Referendum should be open to anyone that would or could have a digital ID in the proposed Digital ID system.

rejection.details:
Hold a referendum on introducing mandatory identity cards in the UK
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/734246
